page.title: 06 Gosforth Park Hotel
page.content: The Hotel was built in 1965 and was opened by the Duke of Northumberland,it is owned by Scottish and Newcastle Breweries and is run by Thistle Hotels. There are four other Thistle Hotels in this area but Gosforth is the only one of its kind in the group because the hotel owns more land and has more facilities.The Hotel is worth a few million pounds,an exact value could not be placed on it.The Hotel has 173 bedrooms and 5 suites.They can cater for about 320 people.They have 25 maids on the staff who clean the rooms out every morning.The guests have many different luxuries in their rooms which consist of trouser press, hair dryers,alarm clocks,sweets,T.V., tea sets and up to 3 telephones per room.Different colour schemes are used in each room,which are,pink,green or blue.The maids have specific
